description:
Mozilla Firefox 124 open-source web browser is now available for download with improved Caret Browsing mode, Screen Wake Lock API support, and more.

The post Mozilla Firefox 124 Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Mozilla Firefox 124 Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New

description:
4MLinux 45.0 independent distribution is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.6 LTS and Mesa 23.3 graphics stack. Here's what's new!

The post 4MLinux 45.0 Released with Linux Kernel 6.6 LTS, New Printing Drivers appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: 4MLinux 45.0 Released with Linux Kernel 6.6 LTS, New Printing Drivers
